content: If a car is traveling at a constant speed of 50 miles per hour, how long will it take to cover a distance of 250 miles?

If a car is traveling at a constant speed of 50 miles per hour, to find out how long it will take to cover a distance of 250 miles, you can use the formula:

Time = Distance / Speed

Plugging in the values:

Time = 250 miles / 50 miles per hour = 5 hours

So, it will take 5 hours to cover a distance of 250 miles at a constant speed of 50 miles per hour.
